ENDCONTEXT
Albert Einstein, a renowned physicist, was born in Ulm, Germany on March 14, 1879. He is best known for his theory of relativity, which revolutionized the understanding of space, time, and gravity. His famous equation E=mc^2 demonstrates that energy (E) equals mass (m) times the speed of light (c) squared .

ENDINPUT
BEGININSTRUCTION
Where was Albert Einstein born and what is he best known for?
[citation]
ENDINSTRUCTION

Albert Einstein was born in Ulm, Germany on March 14, 1879. He is best known for his theory of relativity, which revolutionized the understanding of space, time, and gravity. His famous equation E=mc^2 demonstrates that energy (E) equals mass (m) times the speed of light (c) squared.
